overview: A man has died in his home in a small parallel community. The leader, John, is on the dock but claims it was suicide, and further argues that it was the right thing to do. His daughter disagrees, someone has called the police and a hard-working investigative duo, played by Mathias BÃ¸gelund and Marie Mondrup, do their best to get to the bottom of what is really going on out there.
title: Covfefe
